topic.Content: The right meal for adolescents consists of (i) chips, noodles, coke. (ii) chapati, dal, vegetables. (iii) rice, noodles, and burger. (iv) vegetable cutlets, chips, and lemon drink.
Reproductive age in women starts when their (i) menstruation starts. (ii) breasts start developing. (iii) body weight increases. (iv) height increases.
Adolescents feel hungry all the time. (iii) taste buds are well developed in teenagers.  (i) is needed for the rapid growth taking place in their body.
(a) Adamâ€™s apple. (b) Secondary sexual characters. (c) Sex determination in the unborn baby.

(b) Find out from your elder relatives about their awareness of the legal status of early marriage. You yourself may get information on it from your teacher, parents, a doctor or the internet. Write a two-minute speech explaining why early marriage is not good for the couple.
(b) What amniocentesis is and how useful this technique is. Why is its use for identification of sex of the unborn child banned in India?

(a) The table below shows the data on likely heights of boys and girls as they grow in age. Draw graphs showing height and age for both boys and girls on the same graph paper. What conclusions can be drawn from these graphs?
Collect newspaper cuttings and information in magazines about HIV/ AIDS. Write a one-page article of 15 to 20 sentences on HIV/AIDS.
